org.ardenus.graphics.image

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.graphics.image.Image
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable, Drawable

    public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deletable, Drawable
    Used to load and render images to the screen easily in OpenGL.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

      • setBillboard

        public void setBillboard(boolean billboard)
        Sets whether or not the image is a billboard. Billboard images are not affected by camera movement, which makes them useful for things like user interfaces.
        Parameters:
        billboard - true is the image is a billboard, false otherwise.
